desc.value: Give your dressy look a lift with these women's Kate high-heel shoes by Metaphor. These playful peep-toe pumps feature satin-wrapped stiletto heels and chiffon pompoms at the toes. Rhinestones on each of the silvertone buckles add just a touch of sparkle to these shoes for a flirty footwear look that's made for your next night out.
